name: Shreddin' Metal
description:
Shreddin' Metal is a virtual reality Wave Shredder™ for the HTC Vive, played with a Guitar Hero controller tracked by attaching a Vive controller to its neck.

Designed by

Aislynn Kilgore
Colin McInerney
Daniel Perry
Jess Pate
Lars Olson
Ricky Llamas
Taylor Gates
